entries.journal_entry_description: Queen Kylantha of Naboo has asked you to assist her in finding three missing Wookiee informants whom she employed. At the time of their disappearance they were investigating the possible connection between the Empire and Trandoshan slavers on Kashyyyk.
entries.journal_entry_title: To the queen's aid, phase I
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Travel to Kachirho on Kashyyyk and head east out of the city. The Wookiee informants were last heard from in the wilderness there. Maybe you can find a clue of what happened to them.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have found one of the Wookiee informants. After you have talked to him, lead him back to the safety of Kachirho city.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have failed in saving all the informants. Return to Queen Kylantha with the bad news.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Escort Drrlirm back to the safety of Kachirho.
